name: Mary's Life: A Makeover Story
description:
Welcome to Mary’s Life!
Have you ever wondered what a life of a world class interior designer looks like? Unique interior projects? Yes! Intriguing workplace and clients romance stories? Yes! Fun and challenging puzzles? YES!
You will guide a humble Mary Snow who just got the job at "High Concept" design studio lead by charismatic Ben Gordon through her career and her private life, help Mary earn the respect and trust she deserves.
You will have very different clients, ranging from young couple in need of a beautiful and functional nursery for their newborn, to the greatest ballerina in the world who hides secret reasons behind her retirement.

Game features:
RELAX and enjoy romantic and revealing story full of unexpected twists and colorful characters.
DESIGN and decorate properties for the most demanding customers. Master various design styles from rustic kitchens to luxurious Hollywood mansions to win your clients hearts and progress Mary’s career!
EXPRESS yourself with a huge variety of premium designer furniture, lighting and décor.
CHALLENGE yourself with exclusive match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
UNLOCK rewards as you help Mary to progress in her career as interior designer.

Mary’s Life will be regularly updated with great new puzzles, designing tasks and romantic stories!
Mary's Life is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
Enjoying the game so far? Share your thoughts in a review below.
